value:
This world exists in a state of
division too? Perhaps it is simply
human to be torn in two.

I am of a noble family...at least in
the world where I am from.$k$pOur home is near the border, so I
joined the Deliverance when
crisis erupted in our lands.

You are not from this place, and yet
you have committed yourself to
their cause. Very honorable.

The weather is often pleasant here.
We should venture out on a stroll.
Such things sooth the spirit.

I like to lose myself in the books
here when I can. It should be no
surprise. Even I like a good escape.

I have been sent to deliver
a hello from your friend
$Nf.$k$pHow nice to get best wishes
for the future.

This much growth seems almost
excessive, don't you think?

I will take an average gain
over none any day.

Less than moderate growth.
Hmm. I can do better.

You have placed your faith in me.
And so, I place my faith in you.

My name is Lukas. I'm among those
who fight for the Deliverance. While
here, I pledge myself to your cause.

What perfect timing you have,
$Nu.$k$pI was ready for a break from
the usual routine. Chat with me
a moment, won't you?$k$pI've noticed that you and I both are
walking a similar path here.$k$pWe are both Heroes, are we not?
Both of us, summoned here.$k$pAnd both, constrained by the habits
and patterns of that place, only to
wake a bit upon landing here.$k$pStill, one can't regret the past,
ties that bind and all. We must
carry on.$k$pDon't you agree? Ha! Well, perhaps
I overspoke.$k$pOr is it that we too deeply
sympathize—and there is really
no need for much ado?$k$pIn any case, I'm glad to be with
you. Right here, right now.
せやあっ
There!
Impressive...
ああああっ！！
This is farewell!
It's my turn now!
Pray this ends quick!
They never learn.
I'm sorry...
Heehee
Yes? What do you require?
Hmm? You needn't needle me.
What shall we do...? Find some sort of diversion?
The Kingdom of Zofia is blessed with great beauty.
My friends have strong personalities. They would try even the most patient of men.
I wonder how the Deliverance fares?
Our meeting here can only be called fortuitous.
Understood.
Ah.
Leave it to me.
